snippet: With the school’s band, the Marching 100, on suspension because of a hazing scandal, the first home football game was notable for what was missing.
abstract: First home game of Florida A&M University's football team is marred by the absence of its marching band, the Marching 100, which has been suspended for a year because of a hazing scandal.
lead_paragraph: With the school’s band, the Marching 100, on suspension because of a hazing scandal, the first home football game was notable for what was missing.

headline.seo: Florida A&M Band Sits Out Its First Home Game
headline.main: Scandal at Florida A&M Leaves a Football Season Without Its Soundtrack
headline.print_headline: Scandal at Florida A&M Leaves a Football Season Without Its Soundtrack
